'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{lax3}}.

## Background

A massive temple devoted to [Wael](/wael/), the Halls are built atop the god's lost titan body and contain several sections whose contents make even the hardiest minds go haywire. The Librarians of the Hand Occult that tend to the facility meticulously document, catalog, and preserve materials from the world above - both the original drafts and the edits. Redacted materials are divided between the Archives wing, where historical records and artifacts are stored, while the Collections contain individuals and creatures detrimental to [Eora](/eora/) and the work of the gods. Notably, the materials do not necessarily go to waste - the Librarians, following the guiding tentacle of Oracle, occasionally release amended texts after revision and anthologizing.  The Oracle has been responsible for maintaining the Halls for centuries, with only a skeleton crew of librarians, archivists, and muscle.
